description._content: Description: Pipe-laying gang at work on new section of pipe-line near Haddam. The hills can be seen dimly in the distance. January,1926. Location: Haddam, Persia Date: January 1926 Description: Pipe-laying gang screwing pipe-line on new section near Haddam (upper dessert)-1926. Location: Haddam, Persia Date: 1926 Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/714 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
